snippet: North Carolina made a statement by blowing out Duke and capturing the A.C.C. regular-season championship and No. 1 seed for the conference tournament this week.
abstract: North Carolina defeats Duke, 88-70, and captures the Atlantic Coast Conference regular-season championship and No. 1 seed for the conference tournament.
lead_paragraph: North Carolina made a statement by blowing out Duke and capturing the A.C.C. regular-season championship and No. 1 seed for the conference tournament this week.

headline.seo: North Carolina Beats Duke to Win Conference
headline.main: Tar Heels Prove Too Much for Duke and Win A.C.C.
headline.print_headline: Tar Heels Avenge a Close Loss With a Rout
